code_SemperKI.connections.cmem¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Services for the sparql endpoint

Classes¶

ManageSPARQLQuery

Contains query from file as object

Module Contents¶

class code_SemperKI.connections.cmem.ManageSPARQLQuery(filePathAndName, post=False, parameters={})¶

Contains query from file as object

redisCon¶
oauthToken¶
filePathAndName¶
parameters¶
retrieveContentFromRedis(initial=False) → str¶

Check if the key is inside redis, if it is, take it from there, if not, save it for faster access

Returns:

The query as string

Return type:

str

getParameters() → dict¶

Retrieve the parameters if there are any so that they can be filled

Returns:

Dictionary that describe the parameters for the query

Return type:

dict

sendQuery(parameters: dict = {})¶

Send SPARQL query. :param self: Contains sparql query as obj :type self: Object :param parameters: The parameters for the query. Need to come from the outside to ensure thread safety! :type parameters: dict :return: result of query :rtype: JSON

KISS-backend
